Today I was in hospital as we have lost our baby. The smell from Walley’s Quarry Landfill owned by @redindustries2 and monitored by the inept @EnvAgency was rife in the hospital. I have returned home to have a natural miscarriage and I cannot even open my windows @StinkStopthe

@stephenbourne2 @ollyandpatch @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency It mat also be worth the people getting in touch with @JolyonMaugham to see if he is still willing to get involved. But this time organise it with those actually affected and not the local MP or council leader.
Jolyon may be able to advise if there is a possible class action.

@stephenbourne2 @ollyandpatch @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency 1/2 Ive said from when I got involved that its a human rights issue. Peoples right to a private and family life is being affected and therefore breached.
People seen reluctant to go down this road though, because I believe they think it'll take too long.
